text: Alexander James Lockie (11 April 1915 – 1974) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1974 deaths Category:People from South Shields Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Alex Lockie
